title: [Installation] Failed to compile PyTorch on IBM Power architecture with CUDA 9.2
body_html:
I am using IBM Power 8 architecture (ppc64le) with CUDA 9.2 and latest cudnn and nvcc. Since none of this supported with conda or pip install yet, the installation is tried with build from source instruction. It leads to the following error

-- Found NCCL, but the NCCL version is either not 2+ or not determinable, will not compile with NCCL distributed backend
CMake Error at /home/***/Downloads/pytorch/cmake/Modules_CUDA_fix/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:137 (message):
  Could NOT find CUDA (missing: CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE)
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/***/Downloads/pytorch/cmake/Modules_CUDA_fix/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:378 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /home/***/Downloads/pytorch/cmake/Modules_CUDA_fix/FindCUDA.cmake:1104 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  CMakeLists.txt:57 (find_package)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/***/Downloads/pytorch/torch/lib/build/c10d/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/home/***/Downloads/pytorch/torch/lib/build/c10d/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD c10d'
